description: This creamy, minty pea soup packs a flavour punch with a serving of delicious crispy bacon-flavoured croutons. It's hard to pass up this tasty warming bowl.
name: Minted Pea Soup With Bacon Croutons Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 rindless middle bacon rasher, cut into 1.5cm pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half of the oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Cook bacon and bread for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until golden and crisp. Transfer to a plate.

Heat remaining oil in same pan over medium-high heat. Cook onion and garlic for 5 minutes, stirring, or until onion has softened. Add peas, spinach, stock and 1 1/2 cups water, then bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium and simmer for 5 minutes or until peas are soft. Stir in half of the mint.
Using a stick blender, blend soup until smooth. Season with pepper. Serve topped with croutons and remaining mint.
